title: Did Fred Trump Run a Campaign Advertisement Called ‘Dope Man’ in 1969?
subtitle: A video purportedly showing a 1969 mayoral campaign ad for Fred Trump called "Dope Man" was created as a spoof in 2016.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Donald Trump's father, Fred Trump, ran a mayoral campaign advertisement called 'Dope Man' in 1969.
